      • PassiveMonster

        public PassiveMonster(double x,
                      double y,
                      java.lang.String image_path,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      int maxHP)
               throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Initialises a passive monster in the game.
        Parameters:
        x - The initial x coordinate of the monster.
        y - The initial y coordinate of the monster.
        image_path - The reference of the image to be used for the monster.
        name - The name of the monster.
        maxHP - The max HP that the monsters could have.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
